MemberSignature.Value: .method public static hidebysig class Java.Net.InetAddress[] GetAllByName(string host) cil managed

Docs.param: the name of the host, or null.
Docs.summary: Given the name of a host, returns an array of its IP addresses, based on the configured name service on the system.
Docs.returns: an array of all the IP addresses for a given host name.

remarks.para: Portions of this page are modifications based on work created and shared by the Android Open Source Project and used according to terms described in the Creative Commons 2.5 Attribution License.

Docs.exception: if no IP address for the host could be found, or if a scope_id was specified for a global IPv6 address.
if a security manager exists and its checkConnect method doesn't allow the operation.

Docs.summary: Determines the IP address of a host, given the host's name.
Docs.returns: an IP address for the given host name.

remarks.para: Portions of this page are modifications based on work created and shared by the Android Open Source Project and used according to terms described in the Creative Commons 2.5 Attribution License.

Docs.exception: if no IP address for the host could be found, or if a scope_id was specified for a global IPv6 address.
if a security manager exists and its checkConnect method doesn't allow the operation

Docs.summary: Gets the host name for this IP address.

Docs.summary: Utility routine to check if the InetAddress in a wildcard address.
Docs.value: a boolean indicating if the Inetaddress is a wildcard address.

Docs.summary: Utility routine to check if the InetAddress is an link local address.
Docs.value: a boolean indicating if the InetAddress is a link local address; or false if address is not a link local unicast address.

remarks.para: Portions of this page are modifications based on work created and shared by the Android Open Source Project and used according to terms described in the Creative Commons 2.5 Attribution License.

Docs.summary: Utility routine to check if the InetAddress is a loopback address.
Docs.value: a boolean indicating if the InetAddress is a loopback address; or false otherwise.

remarks.para: Portions of this page are modifications based on work created and shared by the Android Open Source Project and used according to terms described in the Creative Commons 2.5 Attribution License.

Docs.summary: Utility routine to check if the multicast address has global scope.
Docs.value: a boolean indicating if the address has is a multicast address of global scope, false if it is not of global scope or it is not a multicast address

remarks.para: Portions of this page are modifications based on work created and shared by the Android Open Source Project and used according to terms described in the Creative Commons 2.5 Attribution License.

Docs.summary: Utility routine to check if the multicast address has link scope.
Docs.value: a boolean indicating if the address has is a multicast address of link-local scope, false if it is not of link-local scope or it is not a multicast address

remarks.para: Portions of this page are modifications based on work created and shared by the Android Open Source Project and used according to terms described in the Creative Commons 2.5 Attribution License.

Docs.summary: Utility routine to check if the multicast address has node scope.
Docs.value: a boolean indicating if the address has is a multicast address of node-local scope, false if it is not of node-local scope or it is not a multicast address

remarks.para: Portions of this page are modifications based on work created and shared by the Android Open Source Project and used according to terms described in the Creative Commons 2.5 Attribution License.

Docs.summary: Utility routine to check if the multicast address has organization scope.
Docs.value: a boolean indicating if the address has is a multicast address of organization-local scope, false if it is not of organization-local scope or it is not a multicast address

remarks.para: Portions of this page are modifications based on work created and shared by the Android Open Source Project and used according to terms described in the Creative Commons 2.5 Attribution License.

Docs.summary: Utility routine to check if the multicast address has site scope.
Docs.value: a boolean indicating if the address has is a multicast address of site-local scope, false if it is not of site-local scope or it is not a multicast address

remarks.para: Portions of this page are modifications based on work created and shared by the Android Open Source Project and used according to terms described in the Creative Commons 2.5 Attribution License.

Docs.summary: Utility routine to check if the InetAddress is an IP multicast address.

if timeout is less than zero.
